a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Terrorism deaths, RAND vs. GTD, World, 1968 to 2020
Comparison of the reported number of deaths from terrorism from the Global Terrorism Database (GTD) and RAND Database of Worldwide
Data source: RAND Database of Worldwide Terrorism Incidents; Global Terrorism Database
